for_coding_agents: This file defines all features that need to be implemented
Each feature has a 'passes' field - initially set to false
You may ONLY change 'passes' from false to true
You may NEVER remove features, add features, or edit descriptions
Only mark 'passes': true after verification (tests pass, manual check)
Work on features in priority order (priority 1 = highest)
Check verification_steps before marking as passing

features.name: Environment Setup
features.description: Development environment is properly configured and all dependencies install correctly
verification_steps: npm run dev starts the server successfully
features.notes: Baseline requirement for all other features

features.name: Unit Tests Pass
features.description: All existing unit tests pass without failures
verification_steps: No skipped tests unless intentionally marked
features.notes: Must pass before any new feature work

features.name: Build Succeeds
verification_steps: No build warnings that indicate problems
